attributes.action: Government to debate the importance of youth sport in mental/physical wellbeing
attributes.additional_details:
Government to consider Mental Health of Children

Government to Debate the Benefits of Sport

Government to not destroy the health of the next generation
attributes.background: Government to consider debate that classroom activities already bring children into close contact, and that attending sports activities in enlarged spaces or outside will not increase their risk of contracting COVID any further.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557497

If this petition gets 100,000 signatures the Petitions Committee will decide whether to schedule a debate on it, to which the Government would have to respond.
